RAAS inhibitors include angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (e. g. ramipril) and angiotensin receptor blocker (e. g. losartan). Diagnosing and coding chronic kidney disease early enables people to access interventions such as Lifestyle advice and pharmacotherapy to reduce the risk of chronic kidney disease progressing and of significant cardiovascular complications.
